nodes.text: The Revenge of the Sith (French: La revanche des Sith) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. The Revenge of the Sith was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on June 28, 2017.

A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away... War has broken out across the galaxy. The terrible Count Dooku and the dreaded General Grievous, seem more determined than ever to fight the Jedi and seize power...
